title: Remove include-bases flag always render Bases
details:
TASK: Remove the --include-bases flag and always render Bases blocks for hierarchy level 4 (class level) without showing other modules, files, or folders.

CURRENT STATE:
- --include-bases flag exists in CLI (VaultCommands.cs)
- includeBases parameter flows through VaultIndexBatchProcessor and VaultIndexProcessor
- Bases blocks only render when includeBases=true AND hierarchyLevel=4
- VaultIndexOptions.cs has IncludeBases property

CHANGES NEEDED:
1. Remove --include-bases CLI option from VaultCommands.cs
2. Remove includeBases parameter from all method signatures
3. Always render Bases blocks for hierarchy level 4 (change condition from "includeBases && hierarchyLevel == 4" to "hierarchyLevel == 4")
4. Ensure class-level indexes only show Bases blocks, not other content
5. Remove IncludeBases property from VaultIndexOptions.cs
6. Update documentation and help text

FILES TO MODIFY:
- src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Cli/Commands/VaultCommands.cs
- src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Core/Tools/Vault/VaultIndexProcessor.cs  
- src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Core/Tools/Vault/VaultIndexBatchProcessor.cs
- src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Core/Models/VaultIndexOptions.cs
